Class TridentInventoryHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.entity.TridentEntity

    Entity, Impalable, InventoryHolder, ProjectileSource, LivingEntity

    public abstract class TridentInventoryHolder
extends TridentLivingEntity
implements InventoryHolder
    An entity that is able to hold an inventory
